Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hillcrest Drive, next to the Regalia Convent.
Room.LongDescription: The large Regalia Convent looms on the south side of the road, almost looking like a giant slab of marble with a few giant statues sticking out from its sides. The large Odgen Family Villa is located on the north of the road. The Odgen Family has been in Oceancrest for a long time, but is not quite as wealthy as they would like to have people believe.
